text: Hey there, my name's Luke and I've
partnered up with Epic Games to refresh
the first hour of Unreal Engine course.
In this hour together, we are going to
be building your very first game, a
simple platformer game where you can run
around, collect coins, and you see a
game over screen when you collect all of
those coins. This course is going to
give you all of the essential
foundational knowledge that you're going
to need to start building video games in
Unreal Engine. And most importantly,
this course is aimed at making that
initial learning curve so much easier.
This course is aimed at complete
beginners. Even if you've never written
a line of code before, this course is
for you. We'll start right at the
beginning, installing Unreal Engine,
navigating the interface, and getting
comfortable with the tools. Then we'll
dive into the core systems, blueprints,
testing your game, Unreal Motion
Graphics, and once you're ready, we'll
start building. You'll write your first
blueprints, create your first coin
collectible, and set up all of the logic
that your game is going to need. By the
end of this course, you're going to have
a complete, fully playable game that
you've built from scratch. This is super
exciting stuff, and I can't wait to jump
into it with you. Click the link to get
started today.
